metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5020 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An exploitable denial of service vulnerability exists in the object lookup functionality of Yara 3.8.1. A specially crafted binary file can cause a negative value to be read to satisfy an assert, resulting in Denial of Service. An attacker can create a malicious binary to trigger this vulnerability.

notes.Note: ebarretto> upstream fix introduced a regression, please check if all necessary commits are included when patching.

criterions.comment: yara: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
